languages.text: "Леди Моллес-Секандас приговаривается к смертной казни. Администратум обязан провести внутреннюю проверку и предать смерти виновного в подлоге клерка и всего его начальства исключая тебя, префект. Еще один такой случай — и перед судебной пушкой окажешься ты".
languages.translation_comment:
дать очков догматика
Стартует этюд VC_MollesWin
Казним жену
Весы налево

дать очков догматика

Весы налево

languages.text: "Lady Molles-Secundas is hereby sentenced to death. The Administratum shall conduct an internal audit and execute the fraudulent clerk along with all their superiors — excluding you, Prefect. Another case like this and the cannon of the law will be pointing at you."
languages.original_text: "Леди Моллес-Секандас приговаривается к смертной казни. Администратум обязан провести внутреннюю проверку и предать смерти виновного в подлоге клерка и всего его начальства исключая тебя, префект. Еще один такой случай — и перед судебной пушкой окажешься ты".

traits.locale_text: "Lady Molles-Secundas is hereby sentenced to death. The Administratum shall conduct an internal audit and execute the fraudulent clerk along with all his superiors — excluding you, Prefect. Another case like this and the cannon of the law will be pointing at you."

"Lady Molles-Secundas is hereby sentenced to death. The Administratum shall conduct an internal audit and execute the fraudulent clerk along with all their superiors — excluding you, Prefect. Another case like this and the cannon of the law will be pointing at you."

languages.text: "Lady Molles-Secundas wird hiermit zum Tode verurteilt. Das Administratum wird interne Ermittlungen anstellen und den korrupten Beamten und alle seine Vorgesetzten exekutieren ... alle bis auf Euch, Präfektin. Sollte sich ein derartiger Vorfall allerdings wiederholen, wird die Kanone des Rechts auf Euch gerichtet."
languages.original_text: "Lady Molles-Secundas is hereby sentenced to death. The Administratum shall conduct an internal audit and execute the fraudulent clerk along with all their superiors — excluding you, Prefect. Another case like this and the cannon of the law will be pointing at you."

traits.locale_text: "Lady Molles-Secundas wird hiermit zum Tode verurteilt. Das Administratum wird interne Ermittlungen anstellen und den korrupten Beamten und alle seine Vorgesetzten exekutieren ... alle bis auf Euch, Präfektin. Sollte sich ein derartiger Vorfall allerdings wiederholen, wird die Kanone des Rechts auf Euch gerichtet."

languages.text: « Dame Molles-Secundas est condamnée à la peine capitale. Quant à l'Administratum, qu'il diligente une enquête interne et exécute le greffier malhonnête, ainsi que tous ses supérieurs... vous exceptée, préfète. Mais je vous préviens : encore une affaire comme celle-ci, et c'est sur vous que le canon de la loi se braquera. »
languages.original_text: "Lady Molles-Secundas is hereby sentenced to death. The Administratum shall conduct an internal audit and execute the fraudulent clerk along with all their superiors — excluding you, Prefect. Another case like this and the cannon of the law will be pointing at you."

traits.locale_text: « Dame Molles-Secundas est condamnée à la peine capitale. Quant à l'Administratum, qu'il diligente une enquête interne et exécute le greffier malhonnête, ainsi que tous ses supérieurs... vous exceptée, préfète. Mais je vous préviens : encore une affaire comme celle-ci, et c'est sur vous que le canon de la loi se braquera. »

languages.text: “莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人判处死刑，内政部需要进行内部核查，把那位贪赃枉法的文员与所有上级人员统统处决。当然，这不包括你，行政官。不过，要是再让我听说类似的情况，法律的炮口恐怕就要对准你了。”
languages.original_text: "Lady Molles-Secundas is hereby sentenced to death. The Administratum shall conduct an internal audit and execute the fraudulent clerk along with all their superiors — excluding you, Prefect. Another case like this and the cannon of the law will be pointing at you."

traits.locale_text: “莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人判处死刑，内政部需要进行内部核查，把那位贪赃枉法的文员与所有上级人员统统处决。当然，这不包括你，行政官。不过，要是再让我听说类似的情况，法律的炮口恐怕就要对准你了。”

languages.text: «Por la presente, lady Molles-Secundas queda condenada a muerte. El Administratum realizará una auditoría interna y ejecutará al funcionario fraudulento junto con sus superiores... a excepción de usted, prefecta. Otro caso como este y el cañón de la ley la apuntará a usted».
languages.original_text: "Lady Molles-Secundas is hereby sentenced to death. The Administratum shall conduct an internal audit and execute the fraudulent clerk along with all their superiors — excluding you, Prefect. Another case like this and the cannon of the law will be pointing at you."

traits.locale_text: «Por la presente, lady Molles-Secundas queda condenada a muerte. El Administratum realizará una auditoría interna y ejecutará al funcionario fraudulento junto con sus superiores... a excepción de usted, prefecta. Otro caso como este y el cañón de la ley la apuntará a usted».

languages.text: 「レディ・モレス・セクンダスはここに死刑を宣告される。帝国行政局は内部調査を行い、詐欺を働いた書記官と、総監である君を除く全ての上司を処刑する。もし同様の事件が再び起こった場合、法律の銃口は君に向けられることになる」
languages.original_text: "Lady Molles-Secundas is hereby sentenced to death. The Administratum shall conduct an internal audit and execute the fraudulent clerk along with all their superiors — excluding you, Prefect. Another case like this and the cannon of the law will be pointing at you."

traits.locale_text: 「レディ・モレス・セクンダスはここに死刑を宣告される。帝国行政局は内部調査を行い、詐欺を働いた書記官と、総監である君を除く全ての上司を処刑する。もし同様の事件が再び起こった場合、法律の銃口は君に向けられることになる」

languages.text: "Leydi Molles-Secundas, ölüme mahkûm edilmiştir. Administratum bünyesinde bir teftiş gerçekleştirilecek ve suça karışmış kâtip de üstleriyle birlikte idam edilecektir. Seni tenzih ederim Prefekt. Tabii bunun gibi bir dava daha gelirse topun ağzındasın, ona göre."
languages.original_text: "Lady Molles-Secundas is hereby sentenced to death. The Administratum shall conduct an internal audit and execute the fraudulent clerk along with all their superiors — excluding you, Prefect. Another case like this and the cannon of the law will be pointing at you."

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Molles-Secundas ölüme mahkûm edilmiştir. Administratum bünyesinde bir teftiş gerçekleştirilecek ve suça karışmış kâtip de üstleriyle birlikte idam edilecektir. Seni tenzih ederim Prefekt. Tabii bunun gibi bir dava daha gelirse topun ağzındasın, ona göre."
